clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: For use as an antiarrhythmic agent

contraindications.pharmacodynamics: Ajmaline is a class 1A antiarrhythmic agent By interfering with the sodium channels this drug allows for improvement in abnormal rhythms of the heart

incompatibilities.description: Amiodarone may increase the QTc prolonging activities of Ajmaline
